data.modePopMessage: Clear all the bubbles to win.
data.modeCollectMessage: Collect all the items to win.
data.modeBombMessage: Clear all the bubbles before 3 mines explode to win.
data.puBuyConfirmRainbow: Would you like to add a Rainbow bubble for {$} coins ?
data.puBuyConfirmBomb: Would you like to add a Big Bomb for {$} coins ?
data.puBuyConfirmFireball: Would you like to add a Fireball for {$} coins ?
data.puBuyConfirmTarget: Would you like to add a Line Extender Power-up for {$} coins ?
data.puBuyConfirmBallPack: Would you like to add a 10 bubbles pack for {$} coins ?
data.loseProgress: Progress for the level will be lost.
data.helpMess1: Clear all the bubbles to win.
data.helpMess2: Collect all the items to win.
data.helpMess3: Clear all the bubbles before 3 mines explode to win.
data.helpMess4: Clear as many levels as you can to earn stars and gifts!
data.helpMess5: Metal cubes cannot be broken, but they can be dropped.
data.helpMess6: Hit up to 3x to release the chains.
data.helpMess7: Hit rocks with any color bubble to break them.
data.helpMess8: Turns a bubble into a contaminated gray blocker each turn.
data.helpMess9: Changes every contaminated gray blocker into a regular bubble.
data.helpMess10: Collect coins by popping or dropping them.
data.helpMess11: Bonus bubbles add up to 3 extra shots.
data.helpMess12: Line clear will pop the entire horizontal line of bubbles.
data.helpMess13: Changes the color of neighboring bubbles
data.helpMess14: Removes the closest blocker and its neighbor bubbles.
data.helpMess15: Hit bombs with any color to explode them.
data.helpMess16: A Fireball Powerup will clear all bubbles in its path.
data.helpMess17: A Big Bomb Powerup will make a big explosion.
data.helpMess18: A Rainbow Bubble Powerup will match with any color bubble.
data.helpMess19: A Line Extender Powerup will extend the aiming line for 3 turns.
data.marathonSub: See how many levels you can successfully beat in a row!
data.ftue1: Move to aim, click to shoot!
data.ftue2: Click the bubble shooter or right click to swap bubbles.
data.ftue3: Collect coins to acquire Powerup bubbles and an additional ball pack!
data.ftue4: Score more points to earn 3 stars in every level!
data.ftue5: Bounce your bubble on the side to multiply your score!
data.aboutsubtitle: Microsoft Bubble HTML5 by Microsoft Corporation Version {v}
data.marathonFTUEDesc1: 3 Starred levels in any world will add it to the marathon mode
data.marathonFTUEDesc2: Adding more levels to Marathon mode increases the amount of prizes you earn.
data.celebrationSubMine: You cleared all the bubbles before 3 mines explode!
